issue.title: paramountplus.com

comment.body:
@Alex-302 


can we add these trackers:

||paramountplus.com/_next/static/chunks/metrics-
||paramountplus.com/ping/?
||paramountplus.com/assets/build/metrics-
||paramountplus.com/assets/build/logging-
||paramountplus.com/assets/build/session_trace-*.min.js
||paramountplus.com/_next/static/chunks/page_view_event-*.js



and fix the "block third party authorization header" option on paramount
